nws_periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws_periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1pm and 4pm. Sunny, with a high near 96. Heat index values as high as 109. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws_periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 77. Heat index values as high as 105. Southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.
